messages.title: HAPPY NEW YEAR FROM BORIS
messages.content: Happy New Year. This year is going to be a big one, for our part of Hillingdon, for the country. The General Election in May will be a decisive moment for the United Kingdom.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Cutting Income Tax & Freezing Fuel Duty
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives have cut income tax and frozen fuel duty, helping families in Hillingdon become more financially secure.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Faster and More Reliable Tube
keyPolicies.policyDescription: £5 million towards Boris Johnson's multi-million pound improvement programme. Ensuring trains run between trains every two to three minutes during peak times.

issues.economy: The Conservatives have cut income tax and frozen fuel duty, helping families in Hillingdon become more financially secure.

housing.content: I will continue to challenge inappropriate developments with vigour.

leaflet.personalStatement: After nine years of getting things done as Mayor of London and delivering real improvements to the lives of Londoners, I hope to earn your support and to continue to work on behalf of you, the residents of Uxbridge & South Ruislip.

politicalExperience.achievements: Delivering real improvements to the lives of Londoners.

contactInformation.address: Boris Johnson, Bay Lodge, 36 Harefield Road, Uxbridge, Middlesex UB8 1PH

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a survey for constituents to tell Boris what they think and offers ways for them to help with the campaign.
